item.title: One paper accepted to ICPP 2024
item.description: One paper was accepted to the 53nd International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP 2024). Our research paper proposes VitBit, an efficient register operand packing scheme for embedded GPUs. VitBit packs low-precision integer data for parallel computation of integer and floating-point engines. Hence, VitBit can effectively increase the arithmetic density of GPU computations to improve the throughput of embedded GPUs.

item.title: One paper accepted to ICPP 2023
item.description: One paper was accepted to the 52nd International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP 2023). Our research paper proposes Warped-MC, an efficient memory controller scheme for modern GPUs. Warped-MC mitigates the latency divergence observed in a warp that create multiple outstanding memory requests. Hence, Warped-MC can effectively reduce a long-tail of load warp execution time to improve the overall GPU performance.
